reviews.review: Великолепная игра,произвела положительное впечатление,очень понравился режим "сражение" и "виживание",где игроки могут сражаться друг с другом,или же обедениться что б выжить под приливом безконечних волн нежити.Стоить отметить что кампании так же очень хороши,отлично создают атмосферу зомби-апокалипсеса

I've played this game for years and it never gets old p.s I use to play it on my dad's account. I love the game play and team work it is fun maps are good custom maps are better the special infected are cool the firearms are sweet the gameplay feels more polished then Left 4 Dead 2. Left 4 Dead 2s animations didn't look as good gunplay didn't feel as good I love the melee weapons and newer infected but it just seems to me somethings aren't as good as the first game I love both and it's hard to find good custom maps for two. Left 4 Dead is totally recommend by me so go gets some friends and play you won't regret it.

To me this game started out my interest in the whole scary/horror genre of games and I've enjoyed playing this game for many hours on the xBox 360. To me it's great because it has different levels you can play on based on your skills of the game and the "boss" type zombies are pretty tame, minus the witch and tank. The tank is harder to kill and it's easy to get by the witch without disturbing her. The levels are pretty vast for what technology they had at the time and I really wish they'd come out with more games like this.

It's more creepy, dark and atmospheric than Left 4 Dead 2. But they ported this into Left 4 Dead 2, plus in the Left 4 Dead 2 port it has all the extra stuff (Weapons, grenade-like items, better graphics). You might be thinking, "Well it's DLC." True, but the DLC is free (on Steam anyway). I still like Left 4 Dead, I just like the ported/"upgraded" version better. However, this Left 4 Dead has its perks. You can do survival on all of the maps (In L4D2 you can only do it on No Mercy for the L4D1 campaigns), It has The Last Stand, which is exclusive to this game and sometimes it's nice to play the original (even though there is a L4D1 Co-op  Mutation). Pretty good game 9/10. :)

But go buy L4D2 instead, it has workshop support, more players, and all of L4D1's content is included with 2.

Left 4 Dead je legendární  zombie střílečkou. Tuto hru zná snad každý a spousta lidi si ve své době vychutnávala úžasný multiplayer, který je i v dnešní době stále živý. Příběh této hry je opravdu temný a hlavní postavy jsou charismatické. Každou kampaň začínáte za jednoho ze čtyř přeživších a to Francise, Louise, Billa či Zoey. Za zbytek můžou hrát Vaši přátele, random lidi či boti. Celý příběh se točí kolem snahy přežít a dostat se k záchrannému transportu jako například vrtulník, dodávka či loď. Gameplay je jednou z věci, co dokázala kdysi okouzlit miliony hráčů a i dnes lákat lidi aby si hru zahráli. Je celkem jednoduchý. Zabíjíte stovky zombie a různých super zombie, běžíte k bezpečnému místu a snažíte se sehnat co nejlepší vybavení. Čím větší obtížnost tím větší zábava. Graficky hra již dost zestárlá, ale engine Source stále dokáže vykouzlit celkem slušnou grafiku, ze které nepálí oči. Doporučuji tuto hru všem kdo má rád střílečky a chce poznat jednu z nejlepších kooperačních her.

+ zajímavý příběh
+ charismatické postavy
+ legendární gameplay
+ spousta kooperačních možností
+ slušná grafika
+ několik kampaní a režimu

Jak dla mnie Left 4 Dead 2 lepiej wychodzi graficznie i fabularnie od Left 4 Dead.
Ponieważ w L4D2 grafika i fabuła jest zrobiona z jajem i nie tylko mówię tak że jest ładna grafika ale i fabuła.
W L4D2 zmieniono trochę wygląd specjalnych zarażonych i upiększono graficznie nowym silnkiem postacie tekstury i wogóle .
Tak na serio nie mogę się doczekać kiedy wyjdzie Left 4 Dead 3 czekam.
I polecam wszystkie gierki Valve bo warto w nie zagrać. :D:D:D

Left 4 Dead is an  asymmetrical cooperative first-person shooter video game, developed by Valve South and published by Valve Corporation. Left 4 Dead contains three game modes: campaign, versus, and survival. Left 4 Dead has four survivors to play as, Bill, Zoey, Louis, and Francis. 

The campaign mode pits the four survivors against hordes of undead zombies as they must run through each level towards the next safe room until the final level where they call for escape. The versus mode pits two teams of survivors against each other through a campaign where one team is the survivors and the other is the infected, swapping in-between every round. The survival mode has survivors survive as long as they can against hordes of infected.

The only reason why I don't recommend buying Left 4 Dead is because Left 4 Dead 2 has all of the content from the first game.
